quest.name: Need Not Apply in Person
journal: Hamund is looking for someone to make a delivery.
It seems miners are being sought at Black Brush Station for temporary employment. Take Hamund's application to Beringaer at Black Brush.
Beringaer has added Hamund's name to the list, but the work promises to be grueling and low paying. Are Thanalan's refugees fated to be exploited and thrown away?
objectives: Deliver Hamund's application to Beringaer at Black Brush Station.

dialogue.name: HAMUND
dialogue.text: Don't suppose ye'd be willin' to do a favor for a miner down on his luck, would ye?

dialogue.name: HAMUND
dialogue.text: Rumor is, a man named Beringaer at Black Brush Station is lookin' to take on miners. I'd go see him myself, but my wife's been taken ill and needs tendin' to.

dialogue.name: HAMUND
dialogue.text: If ye'd be so kind as to take my application to this Beringaer fellow, I'd be in yer debt.

dialogue.name: BERINGAER
dialogue.text: State your business, quick-like. I'm busy.

dialogue.name: BERINGAER
dialogue.text: Another miner lookin' for work, is it? Let's see... Everythin' looks to be in order. All right, I'll go ahead an' add him to the list.

dialogue.name: BERINGAER
dialogue.text: These refugees are a bloody Twelvesend. They break their backs for next to nothin'. And when they're washed up, there's always another to take their spot!

dialogue.name: BERINGAER
dialogue.text: The poor fools dig up pebbles worth more'n they'll see in their whole lifetime. Eorzea can be a right cruel place at times, but I ain't one to change what ain't broke.
